name: MDBList
description: Get Movies and TV Shows data with ratings from multiple providers in JSON format

api_methods.name: Search by Title
api_methods.description: Search for Movies or TV Shows by title, include option year or mediatype filter to narrow your results

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: Movie or TV Show Title to search

parameters.name: l
parameters.description:
Limit returned items.
You can use numbes from 1 to 100 (default is 50)

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Year (format YYYY, for example 2020) to limit title search (would also include previous and next year movies)

parameters.name: m
parameters.description: Search for only movie or tv show, leave empty for both

utterances.utterance: Search for the TV show 'Breaking Bad'.
Get details about the movie 'The Dark Knight' released in 2008.
Find the top 10 results for the movie 'Avatar'.
Search for the TV show 'Friends' and limit the results to 20 items.
Get information about the movie 'Titanic' released in 1997.
Find details about the TV show 'Stranger Things'.
Search for the movie 'Jurassic Park' and limit the results to 15 items.
Get information about the movie 'The Matrix' released in 1999.
Find details about the TV show 'Game of Thrones' and limit the results to 30 items.
